CustomField.description: Registered Nurse instructed the patient to connect with the Veterans Crisis Line. NOTE - this new, separate field is for a patient that is NOT in crisis and is in addition to the "Provided Info for Veterans Crisis Line" in the Patient in Crisis section. NOTE 2 - The field "Provided Info for Veterans Crisis Line" in the first NOTE already used the API/Field Name of "VCC_Provided_info_Veterans_Crisis_Line__c". I provided a similar but distinguishing API name for future ease of use and identification.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Veterans Crisis Line connects Veterans, Service Members, and their loved ones in crisis to qualified, caring VA Responders through a confidential toll-free hotline, online chat, or text 24/7. Contact the Veterans Crisis Line: Dial 988 then press 1, chat online, or text 838255.
CustomField.label: Provided Info for Veterans Crisis Line
